TEXT.TITLE: CHAMPION <CHA> IN 285 MLN DLR EXPANSION
TEXT.BODY: Champion International Corp said its board approved a 285 mln dlrs expansion of its mill in Hinton, Alberta, Canada. The project will double capacity of the mill's pulping operation to 424,000 short tonnes a year. Champion expects the expansion to be completed by 1989. Reuter
